channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Verizon will pay you $20 following its nationwide outage — here’s how to get it
item.description: Verizon is offering customers a $20 account credit following a massive outage that brought down service across the US on Wednesday. In an update on X, Verizon says you'll receive a text message when the credit is available, which you can redeem by logging into the myVerizon app and accepting it. "Yesterday, we did not […]

item.title: Spotify is raising its prices to $13 a month for US users, the third price hike in three years
item.description: There's another Spotify price hike on the way, and we can't say we're entirely surprised.

item.title: More than 100 classic episodes of Sesame Street are now streaming on YouTube and YouTube Kids
item.description: If you’re looking for something to entertain your kids for the next several months (and potentially longer), YouTube would like you to know that more than 100 classic episodes of Sesame Street are now streaming on the platform. The partnership between Sesame Street creator Sesame Workshop and YouTube was first announced last year and encompasses both old episodes as well as new content. Some of the themed compilations that have also been added to YouTube and YouTube Kids focus on specific educational topics such as ABCs and STEM, while others have broader themes like “Adventure & Imagination” ...

item.title: CIOs don’t need more AI—they need AI that actually understands their business
item.description: Why copilots stall and context-aware AI is essential for real enterprise decision-making.

item.title: Wikimedia Foundation announces new AI partnerships with Amazon, Meta, Microsoft, Perplexity and others
item.description: The AI partnerships allow companies to access the org's content, like Wikipedia, at scale.

item.title: Streaming en vol : Air France et Apple TV+ signent un accord inédit
item.description: Air France profite de son déploiement Starlink pour frapper fort : un partenariat avec Apple TV+ permettant de streamer en haute définition à 10 000 mètres d'altitude.

item.title: Intel prépare sa revanche sur AMD : deux nouvelles gammes arrivent dès mars 2026
item.description: Intel prépare un printemps très animé sur le front des processeurs grand public. Deux nouvelles gammes desktop, pensées comme des armes de retour face à AMD, seraient prêtes à débarquer dès mars ou avril : les Core Ultra 200K Plus et 200HX Plus, alias Arrow Lake Refresh.

item.title: 25 ans de Wikipedia : malgré les questions sur l’avenir, les Français restent accros
item.description: À l’occasion de ses 25 ans, Wikipédia dresse le bilan de son rôle dans l’accès au savoir et s’interroge sur son avenir. Confiance du public, indépendance économique, intelligence artificielle, démocratie et nouveaux partenariats. L’encyclopédie se projette vers les 25 prochaines années.

item.title: Windows Server 2008 is finally gone, after Microsoft pulls support at last
item.description: Microsoft has ended all support (ESU and PA) for Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008, and we mean all support.

item.title: Ricoh’s black-and-white-only camera launches in February for $2,200
item.description: The Ricoh GR IV Monochrome now has a price and is already up for preorder. The dedicated black-and-white camera, based on the standard GR IV with a fixed 28mmm-equivalent lens, will cost $2,199.95 - a $700 premium over the GR IV. Ricoh first announced the GR IV Monochrome was being made back in October, and […]

item.title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms was almost the first Game of Thrones movie, the show's creator says — and it nearly happened because of George R.R. Martin
item.description: The new Game of Thrones show's creator explains why it won't be released all at once – and how it almost saw the light of day as a movie instead.

item.title: The Sony Bravia 8 II is a TV enthusiast’s dream
item.description: Sony has a history of making excellent TVs, from the Trinitron CRTs of last century to the world's first OLED nearly 20 years ago to 2016's ZD9 mini-LED that delivered exceptional brightness and dimming control for the time. And while Samsung beat Sony to the market with the S95B, in 2022 Sony was the first […]

item.title: Here’s Your First Look at Sophie Turner’s Lara Croft
item.description: Amazon's 'Tomb Raider' series, created by Phoebe Waller-Bridge of 'Fleabag' fame, is currently in production.

item.title: Mentra’s first smart glasses are open-source and come with their own app store
item.description: Mentra will soon start shipping its first smart glasses, the Mentra Live. At first glance, there’s nothing obvious setting Mentra’s glasses apart from its more well-known competitors, but they come with their own dedicated app store, and employ an open-source OS with an SDK that developers have had access to since early 2025. Mentra says the MiniApp Store is the first app store of its nature for smart glasses, and it will be available to iOS and Android users through the Mentra app. It might be a bit of a reach to call it the smartphone-ification of smart glasses at this early stage, but that ...

item.title: Samsung’s refreshed Mobile Gaming Hub is trying to make it easier to discover new games
item.description: During CES 2026, Samsung unveiled plenty of new TVs, monitors and other hardware. However, the company is also looking to expand further into video games and has announced a significant refresh to its Gaming Hub on smartphones. Engadget spoke with Samsung’s Jong Woo, VP of Game Services, who explained that the update will offer more personalized, faster ways to play and place greater emphasis on up-and-coming titles. Now available on Galaxy devices, with further updates planned, the new hub wants to be a more active space for the latest mobile games. "We believe that gamers want to find new co...

item.title: Best Packing Cubes for Every Kind of Trip (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re a no-frills backpacker or a bag-checking fashionista, there’s a perfect packing cube out there for you.

item.title: How one startup is using probiotics to try and ease the copper shortage
item.description: Transition Metal Solutions is applying a special cocktail to coax microbes into unlocking more copper from ore.

item.title: US senators demand answers from X, Meta, Alphabet on sexualized deepfakes
item.description: In a letter to the leaders of X, Meta, Alphabet, Snap, Reddit and TikTok, several U.S. senators are demanding the companies provide proof that they have "robust protections and policies" in place, and how they plan to curb the rise of sexualized deepfakes on their platforms.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Friday, January 16 (game #1453)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Friday, January 16 (game #950)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: 'Any use of AI tools to impersonate other artists or styles is strictly prohibited': Bandcamp just showed Spotify how easy it is to ban AI slop
item.description: Bandcamp just showed Spotify how it's done, banning 'any use of AI tools to impersonate other artists or styles'

item.title: PS5 Pro : une mise à jour massive va débrider la console avant le mois de mars
item.description: La PS5 Pro n'a pas encore tout montré. D'ici quelques semaines, Sony devrait déployer le PSSR 2.0, une évolution majeure de son IA capable de doubler la fluidité des jeux et d'améliorer vos vieux titres.

item.title: Roblox's age verification system is reportedly a trainwreck
item.description: Roblox's age-verification system was designed as a response to allegations it has a child predator problem. Less than a week in, how's it going? Well, Wired reported on Tuesday that, in some cases, it's classifying children as adults and adults as children. So, not so great!Last week, Roblox made age verification mandatory for anyone using the platform's chat feature. That process involves either submitting a facial age estimate via selfie or (optionally for anyone 13 or older) uploading a government ID check. After verifying, you can only chat with groups of players around your age.The move c...

item.title: Hyperpop PS5 controller and console cover pre-orders build-up — all the best links ahead of the new DualSense and faceplate collection dropping tomorrow
item.description: We've got all the best information and links for Sony's latest addition to its suite of PS5 controllers and console covers: the Hyperopop Collection.

item.title: Ces 3 opérateurs mobiles vont facturer la résiliation de leurs forfaits, vers la fin du changement gratuit ?
item.description: Emboîtant le pas à B&YOU, trois autres opérateurs de téléphonie mobile annoncent l'arrivée de frais de résiliation sur leurs forfaits sans engagement.

item.title: Spotify raises its subscription prices in the U.S. again
item.description: Spotify's new price for its individual plan is $12.99 per month

item.title: 007 First Light dev admits it messed up PC specs announcement
item.description: IO Interactive raised a few eyebrows last week when it announced the minimum and recommended PC specs for 007 First Light. To run the James Bond adventure at in 1080p at 60 fps, IOI initially said you'd need to have a rig with at least 32GB of RAM and a GPU with 12GB of VRAM. The studio has now revised those numbers and other elements of the specs after "the community flagged some inconsistencies in an earlier version of the listing."The developer blamed an "internal miscommunication" which led to it sharing an older version of the specs. One of the recommended GPUs in the original version was...

item.title: Dynamic Island, MagSafe, l’iPhone 17e se modernise, mais pas partout
item.description: Si le passage à la Dynamic Island semble acté pour l'iPhone 17e, Apple ferait une nouvelle fois l'impasse sur une technologie d'écran devenue pourtant la norme.

item.title: Comment YouTube va empêcher les enfants de scroller à l’infini
item.description: Les équipes de Google vont donner aux parents de nouveaux outils de supervision pour contrôler le temps de visionnage des Shorts de leur enfant.

item.title: Remember that viral Tea app? The controversial ‘dating safety’ platform is back, this time on the web
item.description: The service, which allows women to exchange details about men, says it put new safeguards in place after two data breaches last year. Will users return? Two data breaches, multiple class action lawsuits, and a removal from the Apple App Store later, the popular and controversial dating safety app Tea for Women is back and launching a new website version of its services today. ...

item.title: Parloa triples its valuation in 8 months to $3B with $350M raise
item.description: The massive round was led by existing investor General Catalyst, with participation from other returning backers.

item.title: NordVPN vs Proton VPN — which provider is better for you?
item.description: Our best VPN overall against a Swiss privacy titan, which is better for you?

item.title: Prep for the Super Bowl with these 15 incredible TV deals I've found at Best Buy — shop 4K, QLED, and OLED displays from $80
item.description: If you're looking for a new TV for the Super Bowl, Best Buy has some incredible deals, and I'm rounding up my 15 favorite, including up to 50% off 4K, QLED, and OLED displays.

item.title: Tiger Global loses India tax case tied to Walmart-Flipkart deal in blow to offshore playbook
item.description: Tiger Global's case in India is being closely watched by investors.

item.title: Spotify augmente ses abonnements dans plusieurs pays, la France pourrait bien être la prochaine sur la liste
item.description: Il existe deux certitudes dans la vie : la mort et les taxes, auxquelles chacun devra s’accommoder. On peut y ajouter une troisième : les augmentations des prix des abonnements Spotify. La plateforme de streaming vient d'en annoncer une nouvelle aux États-Unis et dans plusieurs pays européens avant — très probablement — un passage par la France.

item.title: AMD Promises to Try and Keep GPU Prices Low Against the Ravages of the RAM Shortage
item.description: AMD is going to have an interesting 2026 fighting against memory prices and—maybe—expanding FSR Redstone to handhelds.

item.title: Get all four Matrix movies on 4K Blu-ray for $45
item.description: The best deal that I’ve seen on The Matrix: 4 Film Deja Vú Collection containing the four main films on 4K Blu-ray discs is $34.99. After missing out on that price around Cyber Monday, I’ve been waiting patiently for it to return. I can wait no longer to rewatch the 1999 classic, so Walmart’s $44.99 […]

item.title: NBA League Pass subscriptions are up to 55 percent off right now
item.description: Basketball fans can save on NBA League Pass right now, which lets you catch a bunch of out-of-market NBA games via streaming. The League Pass Premium subscription is on sale for $75, down from the usual $160, and League Pass Standard is marked down to $50 from $110. Considering we're almost halfway though the season, the discount makes sense and is a good deal for anyone who wants to keep a close eye on the rest of the games to be played this year. The Standard plan includes commercials and support for only one device at a time, while the Premium tier offers no commercials, in-arena streams du...

item.title: How to Get to Heaven From Belfast trailer teases childhood friends on an eerie adventure
item.description: Netflix has dropped its trailer for "How to Get to Heaven From Belfast", the new comedy thriller from "Derry Girls" creator Lisa McGree.

item.title: Believe it or not, Monster Hunter Wilds may be running poorly on your PC if you own less DLC
item.description: Capcom has been hard at work on patching Monster Hunter Wilds for its performance woes, but it seems as though an unbelievable fix has come through a Redditor.

item.title: La Chine interdit à ses entreprises d’utiliser ces logiciels de cybersécurité américains et israéliens
item.description: Pékin veut remplacer les technologies américaines et israéliennes de cybersécurité par des alternatives locales : un logiciel concerné par cette nouvelle liste noire est dans le giron du géant français Thalès.

item.title: A former Apple executive turned wine entrepreneur is choosing a ‘long-term strategy’ over scale
item.description: After decades chasing the next big thing in tech, Xander Soren is intentionally keeping his wine brand small enough to taste every decision. For most people, leaving Apple after two decades would mean stepping away from sleek design and obsessive detail. For Xander Soren, it simply meant translating those principles into a different medium and bottling them....

item.title: Amazon’s ‘God of War’ Show Has Found Its Kratos
item.description: Plus, Marvel's Brad Winderbaum teases 'VisionQuest'.

item.title: Valerion VisionMaster Max projector review: Near-perfect image quality comes at a price
item.description: After a widely hyped and successful Kickstarter campaign, Valerion’s 4K VisionMaster Max laser projector has finally arrived. It’s the company’s new flagship model in the VisionMaster series, offering better image quality and more convenience than its other models. However, it’s quite expensive and has some stiff competition from Anker’s Nebula X1 and XGIMI’s Horizon 20 Max. I was eager to see how it compared to those models and if it delivers on Valerion’s promise of “pure cinema.” It does offer better image quality, but the difference isn’t quite enough to justify the big jump in price for m...

item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 6 launch: our live coverage of the Deadpool update
item.description: Here's our coverage of the launch of Marvel Rivals Season 6 as it happens. This includes a look at the release time, and the new Hero Deadpool.

item.title: Startup’s Next-Gen ‘Space Armor’ Set for First In-Orbit Test on SpaceX Mission This Year
item.description: Atomic-6's innovative Space Armor tiles will finally be put to the test later this year.

item.title: I spent a year on Linux and forgot to miss Windows
item.description: It was an overcast January morning in 2025 the day I decided to delete my operating system. The Ubuntu installer warned me that it would remove everything on my hard drive, permanently wiping the entire Windows 10 installation I'd been running for years at that point. I hesitated for a second - maybe I should […]

item.title: The Audeze Maxwell 2 is an incredible high-end gaming headset – but don’t expect a big upgrade from its predecessor
item.description: The Audeze Maxwell 2 is a high-end wireless gaming headset with true audiophile-grade sound quality, but in its quest for perfect audio, some compromises have been made.

item.title: Owner of big gaming platform can't believe how bad Windows 11 is – and hints are dropped about big things for Linux gamers this year
item.description: Windows 11 is taking a lot of heat these days, and GOG ('Good Old Games') is the latest to fire flak at Microsoft's OS.

item.title: Trump administration imposes a 25 percent tariff on high-end chips
item.description: President Trump has signed a proclamation imposing a 25 percent tariff on “certain advanced computing chips,” the White House has announced. As The New York Times notes, the administration previously threatened much bigger and broader tariffs for chips. Trump even said that he was going to impose a 100 percent tariff on companies unless they invest on semiconductor manufacturing in the United States. The new tariff will only affect advanced chips imported into the US and are meant to be re-exported to other countries to sell. In its announcement, the White House specifically named AMD MI325X ...

item.title: Gossip app Tea is back — but not on the App Store
item.description: Tea app, the platform for women to discuss men they're dating, is relaunching today.

item.title: Apples iPhone 17e will get Dynamic Island, report claims
item.description: Apple's iPhone 17e, likely coming this spring, is getting a big display upgrade.

item.title: « Défendre un Bandcamp humain » : la plateforme dit non à l’IA
item.description: Bandcamp, la plateforme de distribution musicale, met à jour sa politique en matière d’IA générative en affirmant haut et fort choisir la création 100% humaine.

item.title: Le silence complice d’Apple et Google face aux dérives de Grok : 28 organisations passent à l’attaque pour dénoncer ce deux poids, deux mesures
item.description: Si n'importe quel développeur indépendant laissait son IA générer des images pédopornographiques, son application serait supprimée en une heure. Pourtant, X est toujours là. Une coalition de 28 organisations vient d'envoyer une lettre vitriolée à Apple et Google pour dénoncer ce deux poids, deux mesures.

item.title: The $5 Million Tragedy: Why Warner Bros. Destroyed A Star Is Born
item.description: In 1984, film librarian Merle Ray Harlin was charged with stealing 419 films. One scrap found in his vast collection was a missing scene from the 1954 film A Star Is Born starring Judy Garland. But there was still 7 minutes of footage missing. It has never been found.

item.title: ChatGPT saved me from a roadside nightmare — this is exactly what we should be using AI for, not for replacing creatives
item.description: A simple dashboard photo shows how AI can solve real-world problems in seconds — without drama, disruption, or embarrassment.

item.title: RAM price hikes: the latest on the global memory shortage
item.description: Random access memory, or RAM, is in just about every piece of technology we use. But it’s also the technology that AI companies like OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and Meta are using to power the servers in their massive data centers. Now, the world’s biggest memory makers — Samsung, SK Hynix, and Micron — are taking […]

item.title: Xiaomi déstocke ses meilleurs produits Tech durant la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Xiaomi frappe fort pour la deuxième démarque des soldes ! La marque multiplie les bons plans sur l’ensemble de son catalogue. Et bonne nouvelle : le tout nouveau Redmi Note 15 5G profite lui aussi d’une belle réduction. Découvrez sans attendre les offres les plus intéressantes !

item.title: Verizon outage update: Cause, credits, and what to know about the SOS snafu heard around the country
item.description: The mobile giant says the issue has now been resolved and that impacted customers will be contacted directly about credits. Yesterday, customers of Verizon Communications across the country picked up their phones only to discover that they had no service.

item.title: Le Phone (3a) Lite déjà soldé : le dernier smartphone entrée de gamme de Nothing séduit avec son écran AMOLED 120 Hz et son design toujours atypique
item.description: Lancé fin octobre, le Nothing Phone (3a) Lite est un smartphone d'entrée de gamme vendu 249,99 euros, mais à retrouver à 209,99 euros en ce moment pour les soldes d'hiver sur Boulanger.

item.title: Spotify is raising prices yet again. Heres how much and when.

item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 6 is going to make sure I grind every single hero thanks to the new Hero Proficiency update
item.description: Marvel Rivals Season 6 arrives tomorrow, and it's looking to be one of my favorite updates so far, thanks to the new Hero Proficiency overhaul.
